short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hide the 'Make' banner from Integromat.com 
 Made By Sar Bar-Shem.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension was created for Integromat users and the Integromat community, who wish to continue using Integromat without being distracted by the "Make" Upgrade Banner. The "Make" Banner will be hidden after you activate this extension and you will be able to work uninterrupted.
